title: Private JP studio apartment near Green St.
posting_body: Our garden level studio apartment is available, beginning September 2022.
We are steps from Green Street station, on a quiet street on the pond side of the South West Corridor.
The unit is ~350sf, has a private entrance, mudroom, living space with kitchen, closet and bathroom.
It has it's own private garden/patio area and a private washer and dryer.
There is plenty of street parking (and no towing for street cleaning).
Solid references are required, as well as a security deposit.
Tenant pays electric, which includes heating.
